FILE: cm220652v11.0.txt
DYAD: FRANCE - SYRIA
RIVALRY: RIV582
DISPUTE(S): MID2856 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2856 

TERRMID: MID2856 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2856 3 -- uncertain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2856 from Gibler, Miller, and Little (2016), Syrian anti-aircraft guns fired on French and Italian planes who were fighting locusts. GLM recommend this case be dropped - as the planes were private planes and there was no protest from Syria or Italy - so coded uncertain.

TERRLINK: MID2856 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2856 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2856 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2856 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2856 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2856 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2856 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2856 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
